title: Wanna Jungle Pool & Bar Ubud (Half-day)
overview: Enjoy a half-day at Wanna Jungle Pool & Bar with tiered pools, jungle views, and tropical drinks in Ubud.

stops.description: Depart for Wanna Jungle Pool & Bar.
Arrive and enjoy tiered pools and jungle scenery.
Sip cocktails and enjoy the view.

title: Wanna Jungle Pool & Bar Ubud Experience (Full-day)
overview: A full day of jungle poolside fun, food, and relaxation at Wanna Jungle Pool & Bar in Ubud.

stops.description: Depart for Wanna Jungle Pool & Bar.
Arrive and enjoy tiered pools, jungle views, and club facilities.
